body:
Overview

The HackerRank - Eightfold integration enables Eightfold users to directly invite their candidates to HackerRank Tests and interviews at the appropriate stages of the job interview process. After candidates attempt a HackerRank Test or Interview, their scores and performance data are added to their respective profiles in Eightfold.

This article provides you with detailed integration steps.

Prerequisites

HackerRank for Work Eightfold
  • You must own an Enterprise plan with a Recruiter license.
  • You must log in as a Company Admin user to generate the Eightfold API key.
  • Log in using the same Company Admin user credentials to create and publish HackerRank Tests, which must be accessible in Eightfold.
  • You must have a user account.
  • You must have relevant administrative permissions to the Admin Console and App Configuration pages.

 

Configuring Eightfold Integration with HackerRank

When configuring the Eightfold integration with HackerRank for the first time, the administrator generates an API key that the admin must keep a record of.

Generating an API Key from HackerRank

  1. Log in to HackerRank for Work with the Company Admin user account.  
  2. On the home page, click the drop-down next to the user icon in the top right corner.
  3. Click Settings.
  4. On the left pane, click Integrations. The Integrations page is displayed. Scroll down and click Configure on the Eightfold option. You can also search the Integration from the Search bar.
  5. Click Generate API Token to generate the API token. A unique API Key is displayed.
  6. Copy this key. You will need to add this key to the Eightfold account to establish the integration.

Note: Ensure to store the API key safely. Once the popup is closed, you cannot retrieve the key again.

Adding the API Key to the Eightfold Platform

  1. Log in to the Eightfold, and click Admin Console in the More menu.
  2. Goto Apps and select AppMarketplace.
  3. The AppMarket place page is displayed. Click Go To App Marketplace.
  4. The page is redirected to the Eightfold app interface, where you can select the HackerRank app.

    Note: You will see two separate apps; one for HackerRank Tests named "HackerRank" and one for HackerRank Interview named "HackerRank Interview". You need to install both separately but you can use the same API key (generated from HackerRank earlier) for both.

    For now, we will install the HackerRank Tests app.
  5. Select HackerRank. The install page for HackerRank is displayed.
  6. Click Install. The Configure Settings to Install App window is displayed.
  7. Enter the Authentication Key that you generated from the HackerRank platform. Also, provide the other required details. Ensure that you provide the Stage for the app; for example, Recruiter Screen.
  8. Click Save Settings & Install. The HackerRank app is installed. Similarly, you can install the other required HackerRank apps, such as HackerRank Interview.
  9. Go back to the Eightfold console and click Apps > Install App. The Install App page is displayed.
  10. Click the HackerRank app. The Configure Settings to Install App window is displayed.
  11. Enter the required information and click Save Settings & Install.

Note: You must perform the same procedure for the HackerRank Interview app. 

The HackerRank - Eightfold integration is now complete.
title: HackerRank - Eightfold Integration Configuration Guide
